version_description:
Minor improvements and fixes

---------------

Infuse 6 has arrived, and includes a host of awesome new features!

## Libraries in the cloud

iCloud libraries allow for seamless syncing of metadata, library settings, and playback progress between all your devices. Start a video on iPhone, and easily jump back in where you left off on Apple TV. Mark a few things as watched on one device, and they will instantly sync over to others. No server software to set up and manage, just super-fast, automatic syncing...exactly how it should be.

## Modern playback core

A revamped, powerful playback engine allows Infuse to tackle everything from super-cute cat videos to the latest-spec 4K HDR films. The entire playback pipeline is now stronger, faster, better, and ready to deliver buttery-smooth playback of your favorite videos.

## Subtitles on-demand

Subtitle downloads are now 100% ad-free! Plus, an all-new global network of caching servers allows everything to work faster and more reliably than ever before.

## Files app integration

Adding and managing local files is now easier thanks to the iOS Files app. Files allows videos and subtitles to easily be moved between apps, organized into folders, or renamed so things look just right.

## AirPlay 2 for iOS

Full support for AirPlay 2 and HomePods is now available on iOS. Seamlessly stream audio to any AirPlay enabled speaker while keeping the video on iPhone or iPad.

## Full list of changes

NEW
- iCloud libraries
- Ad-free subtitles from OpenSubtitles
- iOS Files app integration
- AirPlay 2 & HomePod support
- Switch between light/dark icons
- Download external subtitles from Plex
- Redesigned app icon

IMPROVED
- Revamped playback core
- Improved streaming performance
- Improved downloads from OpenSubtitles
- Improved support for E-AC3 audio tracks
- Improved Plex indexing
- Improved Google Cast streaming
- Improved display of video durations
- Improved syncing of Up Next list
- Improved handling of release dates and time zone offsets
- Improved detection of video resolutions
- Improved error handling for Google Drive
- Many, many other minor improvements

For full release details visit: firecore.com/releases

Thanks so much for using Infuse! If you have a moment to leave a review in the App Store, we would really appreciate it.

Minor improvements and fixes

---------------

Infuse 6 has arrived, and includes a host of awesome new features!

## Libraries in the cloud

iCloud libraries allow for seamless syncing of metadata, library settings, and playback progress between all your devices. Start a video on iPhone, and easily jump back in where you left off on Apple TV. Mark a few things as watched on one device, and they will instantly sync over to others. No server software to set up and manage, just super-fast, automatic syncing...exactly how it should be.

## Modern playback core

A revamped, powerful playback engine allows Infuse to tackle everything from super-cute cat videos to the latest-spec 4K HDR films. The entire playback pipeline is now stronger, faster, better, and ready to deliver buttery-smooth playback of your favorite videos.

## Subtitles on-demand

Subtitle downloads are now 100% ad-free! Plus, an all-new global network of caching servers allows everything to work faster and more reliably than ever before.

## Files app integration

Adding and managing local files is now easier thanks to the iOS Files app. Files allows videos and subtitles to easily be moved between apps, organized into folders, or renamed so things look just right.

## Full list of changes

For full release details visit: firecore.com/releases

Thanks so much for using Infuse! If you have a moment to leave a review in the App Store, we would really appreciate it.

NEW
- Sync downloaded subtitles via iCloud
- Sync direct URLs via iCloud
- Read-ahead buffering (for improved streaming)

IMPROVED
- Improved SMB streaming
- Improved audio track selection logic
- Improved support for VobSub subtitles
- Improved error handling for Dropbox
- Improved connection management for HTTP-based shares
- Minor improvements for metadata fetching

FIXED
- Minor UI fixes

For full release details visit: firecore.com/releases

Thanks so much for using Infuse! If you have a moment to leave a review in the App Store, we would really appreciate it.

FIXED

- Fixed playback after cellular data usage prompt
- Fixed vertical alignment for playback sliders
- Other stability fixes

For full release details visit: firecore.com/releases
